title: Under the Jolly Roger: Being an Account of the Further Nautical Adventures of Jacky Faber
description: After leaving the Lawson Peabody School for Young Girls in Boston—under dire circumstances, of course—Jacky Faber boards a whaling ship bound for London, where she hopes to find her beloved Jaimy. But things don’t go as planned, and soon Jacky is off on a wild misadventure at sea.
author: L.A. Meyer
